segments.text: Please point out the painful place with your finger . Is there any relation between the pain and the weather ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the pain comes more intense when the weather is bad . And the pain comes more intense when I walk too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever had any trauma ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the pian become more intense at night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it does . Just like a needle prick . Besides , the place that hurts often feels cold , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have the sensation of ants crawling over the painful part ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to treat you with acupuncture if you agree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , does acupuncture hurt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Acupuncture may cause just a little pain , but it also causes a certain feeling of numbness and distension.We ' ll try it every day for seven days.Will that be all right ?
segments.speaker: S1
